items.sentence: Tom told everybody at work that he was going to retire.
Tom told me he was planning to go to college in Boston.
She interrupted him while he was speaking to my father.
If I had known your email address, I would\'ve written.
If I had seen Tom yesterday, I would\'ve talked to him.
If I lost my key, I wouldn\'t be able to lock the door.
I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.
I made a list of people I wanted to invite to my party.
I never even got to tell Tom about what we did for him.
People usually don\'t like what they don\'t understand.
